column1:
table {
		width: 100%;
	}
	thead, tbody, tr, td, th { display: block; }
	tr:after {
		content: ' ';
		display: block;
		visibility: hidden;
		clear: both;
	}
	thead th {
		height: 30px;
        text-align: left;
	}
	tbody {
		height: 120px;
		overflow-y: auto;
	}
	thead {
		/* fallback */
	}
	tbody td, thead th {
		width: 19.2%;
		float: left;
	}
